Master-detail is a type of field on the child object. The correct answer is C
Why not B?

The correct answer is Master Detail. 
You can only create a MD on the child object, which in this instance is the Job Application custom object. Then you can create a Roll-up summary on the master, which is the Job Posting custom object. 
The key is the ability to identify which is the Master and child.

To make the Job Application a child of the Job Posting and allow for roll up summaries to be created on the Job Posting, you need to first create a Master Detail relationship between the two objects. The MD relationship needs to be on the child object so that its values can be related (and controlled) by the Parent.

To configure the requirement of providing phone contact with the customer every 24 hours for premier support accounts, an administrator should configure a Sequential Milestone.

A Sequential Milestone is a series of steps that define the specific actions that need to be completed to achieve a specific goal. In this case, the goal is to provide phone contact with the customer every 24 hours until the case is closed.
